sentence.Network_en: It was five long miles to the nearest pub.
sentence.Network_cn: 离最近的酒吧有长长的5英里的路程。

sentence.Network_en: He was jailed for five years as an alleged British spy.
sentence.Network_cn: 他被指控为英国间谍，入狱关押了5年。

sentence.Network_en: The average commuter journey there is five hours long.
sentence.Network_cn: 那里的通勤一族平均上下班要花5个小时。

means.word_mean: 1. a game in which a pitcher allows the opposing team 5 hits

auth_sentence.content: He signed a five-album record deal with Sony BMG.
